name: The Reef Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were impressed with The Reef on the website, and it was even better when we got here. The view and spacious suites are fantastic. My husband finished his scuba certification through Ocean Frontiers, and they were outstanding. We enjoyed a very relaxing time. We liked the relative quietness of the resort. So glad we decided not to stay on 7 Mile Beach! 2/14-2/21/2007
reviews.title: We loved it!

likes.liked: — The spaciousness of the condo and location so close to beach and water
likes.disliked: — Distance to Georgetown but in a way that is a plus because less people on road

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There were pluses and minuses to The Reef Resort. It is definitely not the right fit for everybody but it is a perfect fit for some.
reviews.title: Pluses and Minuses

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pluses
reviews.title: Won't be going back!!!

likes.liked: — Everything was only average... Nothing really stands out

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. View is wonderful. Every room is ocean front.
reviews.title: Pure Relaxation
Fabulous family vacation!!
reviews.text: 2. Even the small suites have a small refrigerator, sink and dishes.

reviews.title: Gives new meaning to peace and quiet
reviews.text: If you are looking for a peaceful getaway from just about everything except sun, sand and sea, this is the place to be. Walk right out your back door, onto the sand and into the water. No noise after 10pm, no dirty beach, and no one to bother you as you listen to the waves and read a good book. Food was excellent and the service was typical island life. We will definately return to this wonderful place.

likes.liked: — walk right out on the beach from your back door
likes.disliked: — had to travel quite a distance for meals

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Reef Resort Feb 20-27, 2007 in a Studio room. It was spotless clean. The IGA across the street and the liquor store at the resort were priceless. The room and view were great, the resort and the whole east end of the island was peaceful and quiet. Very uncrowded...in fact we were able to use the same beach chairs the entire week.
reviews.title: The Reef Resort Was Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We rented a car from Andy's with no problems. We spent a lot of time at the resort, and also many days touring the island. Rum Point was excellent, Stingray City and Coral Gardens are a must. We caught the boat at Rum Point to both of these. Also did the QEII Botanial Gardens...also great.
reviews.title: Absolute Paradise!!!
Heaven on Earth
reviews.text: We only actually ate at the Reef Resort a couple of times and it was great. Most of our meals we ventured out to other places such as.....The Lighthouse, Portofinos, Kaibo Grill, Over the Edge.....all were excellent! For local cuisine we ate at Captain Herman's East Side Fish Fry (actually it's located on the South side of the island). A must do.....there is only one item on the menu (fish)....you eat outside on the beach....ask for pepper and onions with your fish (it will spice up your day)....bottom line it is good!
My husband is a diver, and went with Ocean Frontiers on several dives....he says the diving and the dive operation was first class.
reviews.title: The Reef loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just got back from 6 days at The Reef with my boyfriend. It was really a nice place, and we had a good experience. But there were a few dissappointments. We stayed in a deluxe studio ( never used the spa tub) -- studio would've been fine. We had a 3rd floor oceanfront balcony--AWESOME !!! ( big, big bucks on 7- mile beach). The room was very clean-- shower, coffee maker, everything was spotless. Really appreciated the cleaniness. Just had a couple negs. on room 1. very low water pressure in shower-- had to stand directly under nozzle 2. AC only could be turned down so far--- ceiling fan on 24/7--- @ times needed to be cooler.
reviews.title: Nice Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ate breakfast every day at the resort restuarant-- very good breakfast---worth the $. We ate an early dinner (4:30-5:00) at the beach bar. Beach bar serves lunch until 5:00--- lg.menu---very good, lg. portions. Food was very good, ate there all week. The staff was very freindly, also. The IGA across street was great, as well the liquor store.
reviews.title: Wonderful Wedding at The Reef

reviews.text: The beach & water were gorgeous. I did think the beach was lacking on shade. I like to stay out all day-- the litlle palm trees just didn't provide enough shade for my boyfriend & I--- minor complaint. I snorkeled every day-- the water seemed pretty choppy & I wasn't impressed with the clarity. Some people said the surf was rougher that week than usual. I've stayed 7-mile beach twice, there is no doubt in my mind the water is prettier & clearer on 7-mile.
reviews.title: Clean, spacious condos, uncrowded beach!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, this is a very nice resort. My boyfriend wants to go back to The Reef-- he likes being away from everything else. I will definitely go back to 7-mile beach-- I like the convience of everything within 5 min. , & I definitely feel like the water is prettier & clearer on 7-mile.
reviews.title: Great overall experience

likes.disliked: — The drink prices - very bad happy hour specials

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I just had our wedding at The Reef this past May, and we were positively thrilled! The staff at the resort took care of everything. It was so simple to arrange all the details (because we didn't have to lift a finger!) and it turned out so beautifully we could hardly believe it. It exceeded our expectations. Oh, the day we had!
reviews.title: Loved The Reef

likes.liked: — not crowded, clean, great beach, private balcony

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I spent a week at the Reef Resort April 15-21 for our honeymoon. I highly recommend this place! I did a lot of research on caribbean islands, with a big criteria being safety and being able to rent a car and drive anywhere on the island. Grand Cayman is perfect for this.
reviews.title: Honeymoon at Reef Resort

likes.disliked: — wouldlike a better selection of local resturants

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Air Travel
reviews.title: Total relaxation

likes.disliked: — switch for jacuzzi was right under switch for vanity light

reviews.text: Delta - terrible. Multiple connections. Go with direct flight on Cayman Air
reviews.title: Awesome Vacation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Airport
reviews.title: Rexlaxation at the Reef

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small but easy through customs
reviews.title: Nice Vacation

description: The Reef is the only resort with All Beachfront Rooms, and Guarantees the lowest rate on beachfront rooms in Grand Cayman
